article_title: Pandemic stops fertility treatments in Atlantic region
article_description: Atlantic Assisted Reproductive Therapies in Halifax and Conceptia in Moncton  N B  say they have no idea how long it will be before they re back up and running  but they want to reassure patients in the meantime
article_content: Atlantic Canada s two fertility clinics have stopped all in person treatments because of the COVID 19 pandemic Atlantic Assisted Reproductive Therapies in Halifax and Conceptia in Moncton  N B  say they have no idea how long it will be before they re back    2579 chars
